ygData.subject: Re: Treant Factions
ygData.msgSnippet: Back when I was killing unkempt druids--- that is, before the patch that made them ridiculously powerful  (of the 4 that stand on that hill, 2 are green and 2
ygData.messageBody:
Back when I was killing unkempt druids--- that is, before the patch that
made them ridiculously powerful (of the 4 that stand on that hill, 2 are
green and 2 are way red to me at level 37) -- I thought the faction
adjustments were a mistake. When you kill unkempt druids, Protectors of the
Pine goes UP, which makes sense, but QRG Protected Animals goes DOWN. This
made no sense to me, since QRG stands for Qeynos Rangers Guild, and I cannot
see why you would lose faction with them for killing the evil unkempt
druids. Anyhow, unless they fixed this when they made the unkempts more
powerful, you will not gain faction with QRG from killing them.


----- Original Message -----
From: Michael Calhoun <ninxf@...>
To: <eq_wizards@onelist.com>
Sent: Sunday, January 16, 2000 1:38 PM
Subject: Re: [eq_wizards] Treant Factions


> From: "Michael Calhoun" <ninxf@...>
>
> I think it is like QRG Protected Animals and Protecters of Pine. Where
are
> the Unkept Druids at?
>
> Michael Calhoun
> ----- Original Message -----

> > > am not sure how to get the other 2 back. Thank you for the help.
> >
> > what factions do you loose from killing treants? i've never killed one
so
> > i don't really know..
> >
